reviews.review_msg: This class has a weekly labs with lots of assignments. Some assignments were due after the course ended which interfered with studying for finals. Course was not too bad but it was easy to lose focus as it was 3 hours longs and content was boring. Lab midterm was super straightforward and no unfair questions.

Christina was great for 304, but the style of her exams were different, but not necessarily a bad thing. you could tell she wanted the students to do well and knew what she was doing but sometimes she'd get lost in what she was trying to explain. Overall quite good though!
